summary: Comprehensive testing of Odyssey travel planning app after UI/UX overhaul. All major features working excellently including vibrant gradient theme, light/dark toggle, currency selector, 3 customer flows, passport selection, city autocomplete with airports, and all API endpoints.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with vibrant gradient theme (violet/purple/pink)
Animated background with gradient orbs working
Light/Dark theme toggle works across all pages
Currency selector shows 10 currencies and changes persist
Plan Trip page shows all 3 customer flow options (Fresh, Partial, Itinerary Only)
Passport selection step with 60 countries and flags
City autocomplete suggests cities with airports (New York shows 3 airports)
Airport selection buttons (JFK, EWR, LGA) appear after city selection
Login page renders with gradient button and theme toggle
Register page renders with password strength indicator (Weak/Fair/Strong)
Navigation between all pages works correctly
API: /api/health - returns healthy status
API: /api/countries - returns 60+ countries with flags
API: /api/currencies - returns 30 currencies with exchange rates
API: /api/autocomplete/cities - returns cities with airports
API: /api/convert-currency - currency conversion working
API: /api/visa-requirements - returns visa info based on passport
API: /api/destinations/popular - returns 8 popular destinations
API: /api/insurance-providers - returns 6 insurance providers
API: /api/baggage-info - returns baggage allowance by cabin class
API: /api/auth/register - user registration working
API: /api/auth/login - authentication working
API: /api/contact - contact form submission working
API: /api/newsletter/subscribe - newsletter subscription working
API: /api/airports/{city} - returns airports for city
seed_data_creation: Test users created during auth tests with @example.com emails
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features from the UI/UX overhaul are working: vibrant gradient theme, light/dark toggle, currency selector, 3 customer flows (Plan Only, Partial, Fresh Start), passport selection with 60 countries, city autocomplete with airport selection. Backend has comprehensive test coverage in /app/tests/test_odyssey_backend.py with 31 passing tests.
